name: Twilight Wings
description:
Twilight Wings

WARNING: Current version sadly has a LOUD music bug. Headphone users beware.

Bullet hell through dawn and dusk.

Twilight Wings was made during Global Game Jam 2022.

Controls:
  • Mobile: Touch and drag to move. Tap to toggle between day and night.
  • Keyboard: Arrowkeys to move. Space to toggle between day and night.
Team
  • Golen (code)
  • Konix (art)
  • Miau (art)
  • Mato (music)
  • Kiu (sound)
  • Lumie (patterns)
  • Frassy, Neo, Squishy (concepts & ideas)
